0.2.name: wordpress/masp
0.2.description:
MASP is an advanced spam filtering web service. It can learn content and responds to incoming threats. In short, it copes with spam efficiently.

Message

Every day each of us is bombarded with information. The rise of digital civilization makes us experience information overload and requires a lot of effort on our part to identify what is most important. Mail, social networks or blogs are just some of the sources of redundant information. The problem of spam itself is slowly turning into the problem of unwanted messages.

Auto

MASP is a service that runs without user’s intervention. Once trained, the algorithm effectively makes a selection of the next comment. Just 50 of your decisions is enough to determine preferences and begin the automatic operation. Whatever you do, sleep or party, MASP manages the information with reference to your user profile.

Solid

MASP Software is designed and made in accordance with modern standards in
